00011 #ifndef INCL_PLPROGNOT
00012 #define INCL_PLPROGNOT
00013 
00014 //! Defines an interface for progress notifications. This interface
00015 //! can be implemented by client classes that wish to display progress
00016 //! bars or similar.
00017 class PLIProgressNotification
00018 {
00019 public:
00020   //! Called during decoding as progress gets made.
00021   virtual void OnProgress 
00022     ( double Part
00023     ) = 0;
00024 };
00025 
00026 #endif
